item.title: 2020-07-01 08:00 This weeks Lean Coffee - Stockholm Lean Coffee
item.description: Like to limit WIP (Work-In-Process), visualization of workflows and self-organizing teams? Want to meet others like you and learn more about Lean and Agile? We are few enthusiasts who meet every Wednesday morning since May 2010, to exchange thoughts and experiences over a cup ...

item.title: 2020-09-08 17:30 Teaser: Kubernetes - West Forest Tech meetup
item.description: Kubernetes is an open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management. It was originally designed by Google, and is now maintained by the Cloud Native Computing Foundation. Mikael is a consultant at West Forest Techno...

item.title: 2020-09-16 17:00 WebAuth, Framtiden för autentisering på webben - Backend Developers Stockholm Meetup Group
item.description: Backend Developers Stockholm välkomnar er till årets första meetup som arrangeras tillsammans med Yubico och Utvecklarbolaget. Ämnet är "WebAuthn" som kommer att presenteras av Emil Lundberg på Yubico. Det är begränsat antal platser så först till kvarn.

item.description: It's time again! While all the alumni of this meetup are posting updates in the Telegram group, we're overdue for a real meetup! We're meeting in Humlegården, bring a cold beverage of choice and pants that you can sit in the grass with. It will be close to 30C so pr...

item.title: 2020-09-10 17:00 Seamless customer journey - It Is All About Integration - Stockholm
item.description: Seamless customer journey. With APIs or other... One presenter ready. Want to add please be welcome... If Corona stops us will be changed to on line. Crossing our fingers.

item.title: 2020-07-29 18:30 Developer Relations Sweden meetup #3 - Open Source and DevRel - Stockholm Developer Relations
item.description: Friends, the basic requirement for any meetup we do is that you all feel safe and have fun. We follow the good practices and shall postpone this meetup to sometime late April or May when we hope the the world is in a better shape. We will keep everyone updated via email. <...
